DOC.brief_summary: To determine tolerance side effect combination lentinan didanosine ( ddI ) comparison ddI alone . To determine whether combination lentinan ddI produce significant immunorestorative effect within study observation period ( 6-12 month ) measure increase one follow : neutrophil count activity , T-cell subset , decrease p24 antigen .
DOC.brief_title: Phase II/III Study Tolerance Efficacy Combined Use Didanosine ( 2',3'-Dideoxyinosine ; ddI ) Lentinan HIV-Positive Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Patients treat daily oral ddI 6 week , randomize ddI combination intravenous lentinan placebo ( administered weekly ) 26 week . Patients already stabilize 400 mg/day ddI proceed directly randomization . Following completion combination therapy , patient may offer 26 additional week therapy optional basis .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must : HIV seropositivity . Absolute CD4 count 200 500 cells/mm3 . No active opportunistic infection Kaposi 's sarcoma . Prior Medication : Allowed : Prior ddI longer 3 month . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow symptoms condition exclude : Lymphoid malignancy . Pancreatitis . Peripheral neuropathy . Critical illness . Concurrent Medication : Excluded : Antiretroviral agent ddI . Steroids . Cytotoxic agent . Immunosuppressive agent . Immunomodulators . 1Thyroxine . Concurrent Treatment : Excluded : Radiotherapy . Prior Medication : Excluded within 1 month prior study entry : Antiretroviral agent ddI ( patient may receive prior ddI longer 3 month total ) . Steroids . Cytotoxic agent . Immunosuppressive agent . Immunomodulators . Prior Treatment : Excluded : Radiotherapy within 1 month prior study entry . Active IV drug abuse .
